name: A Home Among The Stars
description:
A Home Among the Stars is a submission to GameDev.tv Game Jam 2021, my first ever Game Jam, and a hopeful prototype for something bigger.

A Strategy\Survival tactical game in space where you are a simple pilot struggling to survive with only your ship to call home. Build a crew and take on missions but with each mission you must decide whether to fill your food storage, fuel tanks, or take in that precious gold for ship upgrades! But beware, neither your crew (or yourself) will survive without food and a ship without fuel barely moves.

Can you find the balance between your crew and ship? How many days can you survive out in the black while exploring the universe?
